title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Mount Rushmore National Memorial partnered with CyArk and local teachers to create ten lesson plans for grades K-12.  The lesson plans are available through CyArk's website,  http://archive.cyark.org/education-lesson-plans. All Curriculum Materials       Learn about Mount Rushmore from many angles. Learn More     Guest Speakers Schedule a park ranger to visit your classroom and help your students learn about many apsects of Mount Rushmore National Memorial - art, natural history, United States history and presidential history.  Click to learn more about bringing a park ranger to your classroom. All Guest Speakers       Schedule a ranger visit for your classroom. Learn More     Field Trips Visit Mount Rushmore National Memorial with your students to see the mountain sculpture in person.  Learn more about the artist and the sculpture by visiting the Lincoln Borglum Visitor Center or schedule a ranger talk inside the Sculptor's Studio.  All Field Trips       Schedule a field trip to Mount Rushmore National Memorial Learn More
